LanguageData:
Vat-Grown Sex Slave [PAWN_nameDef] is made as a sex machine, rather than a human. During [PAWN_possessive] growing period in the factory, [PAWN_pronoun] was taught plenty of social skills and sex skills, just to satisfy various sex demands.
人造性奴隷 [PAWN_nameDef]はヒトというよりは肉便器として造られました。ファクトリーで成長している間に、様々な肉欲を満たすためだけに十分な社交術と性技術を[PAWN_pronoun]は躾けられました。
Feisty Nymph [PAWN_nameDef] struts around the colony like a conqueror examining a newly annexed territory. You try to focus on your work but [PAWN_pronoun] won't let you.\n "I heard what you said about me!" [PAWN_pronoun] accuses. You didn't say anything about [PAWN_objective]. [PAWN_pronoun] knows that. "Wanna fight?" [PAWN_pronoun] challenges. You already know what [PAWN_pronoun] means: a few minutes of play wrestling and then you take [PAWN_objective], or, if you hesitate, [PAWN_pronoun] takes you.\n Though [PAWN_nameDef] can be hard to get along with you've come to appreciate how [PAWN_pronoun]'s more practical than the others.\n You explain to [PAWN_objective], "See these things here? They need to be over there" and "Those people are trying to kill us, so let's kill them first." [PAWN_pronoun] listens, and does what is necessary.
怒れるニンフ（x 高度な作業、看護、動物の世話、アート、清掃）
Curious Nymph Hold the covering plate back and place the actuator in slot C. Line the rod up. No, that won't do, it needs to be perfect. Now pop the JC-444 chip in place.\n Solder the orange wire to pin #16 and the striped wire to pin #5.\n Suddenly, there [PAWN_pronoun] is. You aren't surprised to see [PAWN_nameDef], you just didn't hear [PAWN_objective] approach. By now you're used to it.\n You continue your work in silence as [PAWN_pronoun] hovers over you, her large eyes fixated on the rapid, rythmic, deliberate motions of your hands.
カバープレートを備えておき、アクチュエータをスロットCに置く。ロッドを上に向ける。うまくいかない、完璧にしないと。急いでJC-444チップを取り付ける。 オレンジのワイヤーを16番ピンに、ストライプのワイヤーを5番ピンにハンダ付け。 突然、彼女はそこにいた。あなたはJANEを見て驚くことはありません、あなたは彼女のアプローチを聞いていないだけです。今ではもう慣れていた。 彼女があなたの上に乗っている間、あなたの仕事は静かに続き、あなたの手の素早く、リズミカルで、意図的な動きに彼女の大きな目は釘付けになっている。
好奇心ニンフ（建築、工芸）（x 雑用、戦闘、看護、動物の世話、アート、料理、農業、採掘）
Tender Nymph [PAWN_nameDef] has a pair of charming eyes, and [PAWN_possessive] voice is soft and sweet. Due to [PAWN_possessive] previous nurse job, [PAWN_pronoun] tends people quite well.\n [PAWN_pronoun]'s crouched in the corner, hands over [PAWN_possessive] ears and tears in [PAWN_possessive] eyes. You don't understand, then you notice it: the distant sound of the pained squeals of pigs being slaughtered.
柔和なニンフ（x 高度な作業、戦闘、動物の世話、アート、運搬） [PAWN_nameDef]は魅力的な目と柔らかくて甘い声をしている。以前看護師をしていたおかげか、人当たりが良い。\n [PAWN_pronoun]は部屋の隅にうずくまり、耳をふさぎ涙をこぼした。屠殺される豚の悲鳴に気づいても、あなたはそれを理解できなかった。
Chatty Nymph No one can be more loquacious than [PAWN_nameDef]. [PAWN_pronoun] has a flexible tongue, a sharp mind, and hot lips.
おしゃべりニンフ（x 雑用、高度な作業、戦闘、看護、動物の世話、アート） [PAWN_nameDef]ほど饒舌な者は居ないでしょう。[PAWN_pronoun]はよく舌が回り、抜け目なく、艶やかな唇を持っています。
Broken Nymph Maybe [PAWN_nameDef] suffered some terrible things, [PAWN_pronoun] looks rather emaciated, and no one wants to speak with [PAWN_objective].\n [PAWN_pronoun] only behaves a bit vivaciously while staring at some rod-like stuffs.
壊れたニンフ（アート）（x 高度な作業、戦闘、看護、動物の世話、清掃）
